title: 820-00281: Display won't come back on from sleep
message: Have this board that once it goes into sleep, the display won't come back on unto i reboot, but external display works just fine. Even after i unplug from the external display, the internal display never comes back on until reboot. No sure if this is related, but also noticed the internal display never goes off when the lid is closed. Any suggestions.

title: 820-00281: Display won't come back on from sleep
message:
Usually Hall sensors issue.
We discussed a lot on the forum about such problem.
Inspect J5250/60 for corrosion; also check R5252/53.

title: 820-00281: Display won't come back on from sleep
message:
No sign of corrosion. Inspected J520/60 and also R5252/53.

With Lid open TP[1]SMC_LID_RIGHT reads 3.4v, once closed it changes to 0.0v but the display remains on.

title: 820-00281: Display won't come back on from sleep
message:
What about left sensor?
Check the reaction at U5255 I/O pins.
Be sure all its related resistors are good; as traces and solders too.

title: 820-00281: Display won't come back on from sleep
message: Left sensor is also responding the same, SMC_LID_LEFT_R 3.4v open and 0.0v once close. Same result with SMC_LID. Another thing i just notice is with the display. After a restart, the display would start flickering on and off every 10 or so seconds. This issue isn't always present after restart of the mac
